sn36.16:4.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn36.16:4.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn36.16:4.4: “katamā nu kho, ānanda, vedanā, katamo vedanāsamudayo, katamo vedanānirodho, katamā vedanānirodhagāminī paṭipadā?
sn36.16:4.5: Ko vedanāya assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṃ nissaraṇan”ti?
sn36.16:4.7: Sādhu, bhante, bhagavantaññeva paṭibhātu etassa bhāsitassa attho.
sn36.16:4.9: “Tena hi, ānanda, suṇohi, sādhukaṃ manasi karohi;
sn36.16:4.11: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paccassosi.
sn36.16:4.14: sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
sn36.16:4.17: khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno rāgo paṭippassaddho hoti, doso paṭippassaddho hoti, moho paṭippassaddho hotī”ti.
